tweets.author: 『新東京水上警察』10月期火9ドラマ【フジテレビ公式】
tweets.text:
#ShinTokyoWaterfrontPolice Final Episode Now Streaming for Free!

Thanks to all of you,
・ShinTokyoWaterfrontPolice
・Kusakabe-kun
・Osawa-san
and more have trended!!

Thank you so much for these 3 months!
You can still meet Team Ikariga with the streams!

Final Episode

thread_replies.author: えもイえぬ
thread_replies.text: Reiko-san protected by Kusakabe-kun, super intense finale

thread_replies.author: Jamf
thread_replies.text: Relatable? We’ve got you. See how leading IT teams are modernizing their Mac management approach on our blog.

thread_replies.author: 𠮷川英梨
thread_replies.text:
The scene with Kusakabe-kun has the author already bawling their eyes out 

#新東京水上警察

thread_replies.author: のじ
thread_replies.text: Kusakabe-kun WA-!! is from original volumes 2 and 5, and as for the Bayside precinct or rather liking Wada-san, read volume 5Endo-kun is my top pick from volume 3 but he's quietly delicious every timeamazing

thread_replies.author: «ちゃんぴな»
thread_replies.text: Kusakabe-kun's mom sees right through everything

thread_replies.author: はち
thread_replies.text: While it's self-inflicted to some extent, Kuskabe-kun, who was in a super-depressing storyline throughout the drama, looked the happiest in the entire 11-episode broadcast of Suijo Keisatsu during the finale when he got ambushed with pro wrestling by Ikarisan. Let's call this

thread_replies.author: 凜
thread_replies.text:
Reiko-chan grabbing the back of Kusakabe-kun's shirt and  
the sight of Kusakabe-kun standing protectively in front of Reiko-chan makes my heart flutter   
#新東京水上警察
おつかれさま、日下部くん。
